entries.meaning: A caption that is subordinate to another caption.

verbs.description: subcaption (third-person singular simple present subcaptions, present participle subcaptioning, simple past and past participle subcaptioned)

entries.meaning: (transitive) To provide with a subordinate caption.
examples: If a user clicks on the yes button, a new message box appears on screen, captioned "System Properties" and subcaptioned "Performance."
